get.description: Lists the billing accounts that a user has access to.

parameters.name: includeAll
parameters.description: When true, results will include Billing Accounts that the user does not have a direct role assignment on if the user has one of the following AAD roles: Global Administrator, Global Reader, Billing Administrator.

parameters.name: includeAllWithoutBillingProfiles
parameters.description: When true, results will include Billing Accounts that are not fully created if the user has one of the following AAD roles: Global Administrator, Global Reader, Billing Administrator.

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: When true, results will include any billing accounts in a deleted state.

parameters.name: includePendingAgreement
parameters.description: Includes billing accounts with agreement pending signature that the user has access to.

parameters.name: includeResellee
parameters.description: Includes the customer's billing account of Microsoft Partner Agreement that the user has access to.

parameters.name: legalOwnerTID
parameters.description: Must be combined with legalOwnerOID, results will only include Billing Accounts for whom is legally responsible for the Billing Accounts. Optional.

parameters.name: legalOwnerOID
parameters.description: Must be combined with legalOwnerTID, results will only include Billing Accounts for whom is legally responsible for the Billing Accounts. Optional.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter query option allows clients to filter a collection of resources that are addressed by a request URL.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Expand is allowed for SoldTo and EnrollmentDetails/PONumber.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The top query option requests the number of items in the queried collection to be included in the result. The maximum supported value for top is 50.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The skip query option requests the number of items in the queried collection that are to be skipped and not included in the result.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The search query option allows clients to request items within a collection matching a free-text search expression. search is only supported for string fields.

post.description: Adds payment terms to all the billing profiles under the billing account.
